sentences.sContent: The quantum theory is not just an esoteric addendum .
sentences.sContent_eng: The quantum theory is not just an esoteric addendum .
sentences.sCn: 量子理论并不只是一个深奥的附录。

sentences.sContent: Six parts and one addendum are separated in the paper.
sentences.sContent_eng: Six parts and one addendum are separated in the paper.
sentences.sCn: 论文由六章和一个附录组成。

sentences.sContent: You can use these as a résumé addendum or for your cover letter.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can use these as a résumé addendum or for your cover letter.
sentences.sCn: 你可以用它们作为简历附录或者用在求职信中。

synos.tran: 附录，附件；[图情]补遗；附加物

phrases.pCn: 齿高变位量；齿顶高修正

remMethod.val: add (增加) + end (结尾) + um (表名词) → 附录

trans.tranOther: something you add to the end of a speech or book to change it or give more information
